author: DryRun
body:
Fix for non-backwards-compatible FED-to-crate tables, as discussed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/17657: offline workflows have been modified to use crateId instead of FED number. 

FEDs are still used for online workflows. 

This PR contains most of the other commits from this year, which were not merged pending a fix for the fed2crate issue.
title: Restore HCAL DQM to offline workflow
